page.title: 13EVENTS
page.content:
The main{events}which take place in the Govan area are:
1. The{Govan Fair: Takes place each year in the Summer. Consists of a number of floats, majorettes, bands, the{Govan Fair Queen, and people wearing fancy dress.
2. The{Shows: An annual carnival put on by travelling show_people. The{shows provide a wide range of entertainment for people of all ages.
3.{Displays in the Park: These are put on occasionally by such people as the armed forces or stunt men, and involve demonstrations of the skills these people posess.
